snippet.title: Creepyshift: Roadside Diner - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Vol. 1 of the 'CREEPYSHIFT' series based on bloody creepypastas.😈

HOW IT WORKS: 
 ► Take a night shift at a roadside diner.
 ► Do all your duties.
 ► Try to survive until dawn.

SHARE YOUR DARK STORY FOR EXTRA SERVING OF FEAR:
►Discord: https://discord.gg/A5gVhhfe56
►Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedLimbStudio
►X: https://x.com/333Creepyshift 

"The thick fog still hung in the air, intensifying the feeling of isolation from the rest of the world. It was an unsettling sensation, but I found a strange comfort in it, as if I’d been surrounded by fog long before taking this jobI’d always liked solitude; it helped me escape the problems I’d brought upon myself. That’s probably why I often took extra shifts where I had to fend for myself."
